website_summaries.verdict: A stylish accessory your guests will have fun with.
pros: Pack of 12 sunglasses available in pink or blue
Scratch-resistant lenses are dark and effectively block out sun
Durable plastic frames  withstand a few falls
Both pink and blue options are vibrant
Sit at a low price point

customer_reviews.title: Plastic contains nickel, beware if you’re allergic
customer_reviews.text: The pros: wide enough for an adult head, fun colors. The cons: these must have lots of nickel (the metal) mixed into the plastic, as I have a nickel allergy and these gave me the telltale rash where they touched my nose/cheeks. This has never happened to me with plastic, only with actual metal. Also, while the description online says they have UV protection, the packaging does not mention that at all, so it may be a false claim. Finally, they are very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Tooch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money
customer_reviews.text: These were very inexpensive, look great, feel comfortable and are actually UV protecting. I would not wear them all day everyday but they are comfortable enough to try. Excellent party glasses
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Church

customer_reviews.title: Great fun party sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go in the goody bags for my bachelorette weekend with my girls. They are lighter/cheaper than I was expecting, but they are still great sunglasses. They fit comfortably, though a little wide (ie, on my face great but when moved to the top of my head inside bldgs, they would slide off easy. Everyone love them, and I still wear my pair often. Had a friend with a cricut machine add custom text to the side arm!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Blippi glasses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a Blippi-themed party- just pop out the lenses. The kids (and adults) loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Phung Hieu Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap, disposable sunglasses! I got them to have glasses in every color to match with my outfits. They’re a little cheaper and lighter than I thought but can’t complain for the price
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for matching outfits!
customer_reviews.text: They are a little cheaply made, but they are fun! I use different colors to make my outfits pop!
customer_reviews.author: roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great for middle school musical
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our middle school musical. Stays on, quality enough to keep later on as a gift. Nice individual covers for each pair of glasses
customer_reviews.author: Mozartmama

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. They hold up well, and color doesn’t come off like some others I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Great deal since my kid goes through glasses like nothing. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great product based on price
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses for the price. Lenses are plastic, not super flimsy like other sunglasses. Bought these for our pink kickball team and ordering another 12 since we didn't order enough originally, everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunglasses with dark shades
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Perfect sunglasses with dark shades. Gave these to my girls at my bachelorette party. Perfect gift for beach day.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: I Love Wearing Different Colors Each Day!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Purchase I really enjoy the variety of colors they also fit comfortable and I use one each day ! I will say this it’s a Great quality buy and quantity for the price paid !!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a bachelorette weekend at the beach and they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for party favors and I loved them $20 for a pack of 12 is a steal
customer_reviews.author: laura
